definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: The banks can handle foreign exchange purchase for official foreign visit groups.
sentences.chinese: 银行可按当日牌价为您办理人民币与外币的兑换。

sentences.english: The rate for traveler 's cheque is 847 yuan against USD 100 .
sentences.chinese: 旅行支票的兑换率是100美元兑847元人民币。
于是他们放弃了英镑的可兑换性。

sentences.english: She went post-haste to the bank and cashed the check .
sentences.chinese: 她急忙赶到银行，把支票兑换成现金。

sentences.english: They of the house of Togarmah traded in thy fairs with horses and horsemen and mules.
sentences.chinese: 陀迦玛族用马和战马并骡子兑换你的货物。

sentences.english: At that price everybody who wanted to buy yen for dollars would find someone who was willing to sell him yen for dollars.
sentences.chinese: 只有在这种兑换价位时，美元出手了才有人愿意接手。

sentences.english: Joint ventures shall not pay foreign currency or foreign exchange certificate to the aforesaid establishments.
sentences.chinese: 不得向合营企业收取外币或外汇兑换券。

sentences.english: It comes to 3645 RMB at today's exchange rate. Here is your money.
sentences.chinese: 根据今天的兑换率，一共是3645元人民币，给您。

sentences.english: Then, if I need yen , I can exchange some pounds for yen ?
sentences.chinese: 如果我需要日元，我可以用英镑兑换些日元吗？

sentences.english: Take the voucher to your local branch of Woolworths and it will be redeemed for one toy.
sentences.chinese: 持兑换券到当地沃尔沃斯的分店可以兑换一个玩具。

sentences.english: Take the voucher to your local branch of Woolworths and it will be redeemed for one toy.
sentences.chinese: 持兑换券到当地沃尔沃斯的分店可以兑换一个玩具。

sentences.english: The value tends to hover around 40 baht to one US dollar.
sentences.chinese: 其价值维持在40铢兑换1美元左右。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we don't accept non-convertible currency, sir.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我们不接受不能兑换的货币。

sentences.english: Check the cash in foreign exchange at any time.
sentences.chinese: 随时抽查外币兑换的现金。

sentences.english: There is a convertible sofa and a single swivel chair, and that's it.
sentences.chinese: 有一个可兑换沙发和一个单一的转椅，就是这样。

sentences.english: How do I use this Change machine？
sentences.chinese: 这台钱币兑换机要怎么用啊？

definition: bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate
(Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
integral (calculus)/accumulated points (in sports, at school etc)/total credits earned by student/bonus points in a benefit scheme
to deposit (e.g. in a bank account)
